committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide for interim designation of United States attorneys and United States marshals by the Attorney General.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the Attorney General (currently, the appropriate district court) to designate a United States attorney or a United States marshal, as the case may be, to fill a vacancy in such offices for a specified time. Prohibits the Attorney General from designating for either position a person whose nomination by the President was rejected by the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to provide for interim designation of United States attorneys and United States marshals by the Attorney General.
